pilots.name: Luke Skywalker
pilots.caption: Red Five
pilots.ability: After you become the defender (before dice are rolled), you may recover 1 [Force].

pilots.name: Red Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: Created as an elite starfighter squad, Red Squadron includes some of the best pilots in the Rebel Alliance.

pilots.name: Jek Porkins
pilots.caption: Red Six
pilots.ability: After you receive a stress token, you may roll 1 attack die to remove it. On a [Hit] result, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

pilots.name: Blue Squadron Escort
pilots.text: Designed by Incom Corporation, the T-65 X-wing quickly proved to be one of the most effective and versatile military vehicles in the galaxy and a boon to the Rebellion.

pilots.name: Wedge Antilles
pilots.caption: Red Two
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

pilots.name: Biggs Darklighter
pilots.caption: Red Three
pilots.ability: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 matching result.

pilots.name: Thane Kyrell
pilots.caption: Corona Four
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Focus], [Hit], or [Critical Hit] result to look at the defender's facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose it.

pilots.name: Thane Kyrell
pilots.caption: Corona Four
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Focus], [Hit], or [Critical Hit] result to look at the defender's facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose it.

pilots.name: Garven Dreis
pilots.caption: Red Leader
pilots.ability: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

pilots.name: Kullbee Sperado
pilots.caption: Enigmatic Gunslinger
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may flip your equipped [Configuration] upgrade card.

pilots.name: Edrio Two Tubes
pilots.caption: Cavern Angels Veteran
pilots.ability: Before you activate, if you are focused, you may perform an action.

pilots.name: Leevan Tenza
pilots.caption: Rebel Alliance Defector
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may perform a red [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Cavern Angels Zealot
pilots.text: Unlike most Rebel cells, Saw Gerrera's partisans are willing to use extreme methods to undermine the Galactic Empire's objectives in brutal battles that raged from Geonosis to Jedha.

pilots.name: Norra Wexley
pilots.caption: Gold Nine
pilots.ability: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

pilots.name: Evaan Verlaine
pilots.caption: Gold Three
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship rolls 1 additional defense die while defending until the end of the round.

pilots.name: Gold Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: Commanded by Jon “Dutch” Vander, Gold Squadron played an instrumental role in the Battles of Scarif and Yavin.

pilots.name: Horton Salm
pilots.caption: Gray Leader
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender.

pilots.name: “Dutch” Vander
pilots.caption: Gold Leader
pilots.ability: After you perform the [Lock] action, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship may acquire a lock on the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.

pilots.name: Gray Squadron Bomber
pilots.text: Long after the Y-wing was phased out by the Galactic Empire, its durability, dependability, and heavy armament help it remain a staple in the Rebel fleet.

pilots.name: Esege Tuketu
pilots.caption: Selfless Hero
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends or performs an attack, it may spend your focus tokens as if that ship has them.

pilots.name: Miranda Doni
pilots.caption: Heavy Hitter
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or, if you are not shielded, you may roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

pilots.name: Warden Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Koensayr Manufacturing's K-wing boasts an advanced SubLight Acceleration Motor and an unprecedented 18 hard points, granting it unrivaled speed and firepower.

pilots.name: Blade Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: A unique gyrostabilization system surrounds the B-wing's cockpit, ensuring that the pilot always remains stationary during flight.

pilots.name: Blade Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: A unique gyrostabilization system surrounds the B-wing's cockpit, ensuring that the pilot always remains stationary during flight.

pilots.name: Blade Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: A unique gyrostabilization system surrounds the B-wing's cockpit, ensuring that the pilot always remains stationary during flight.

pilots.name: Blue Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Due to its heavy weapons array and resilient shielding, the B-wing has solidified itself as the Rebel Alliance's most innovative assault fighter.

pilots.name: Blue Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Due to its heavy weapons array and resilient shielding, the B-wing has solidified itself as the Rebel Alliance's most innovative assault fighter.

pilots.name: Blue Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Due to its heavy weapons array and resilient shielding, the B-wing has solidified itself as the Rebel Alliance's most innovative assault fighter.

pilots.name: Braylen Stramm
pilots.caption: Blade Leader
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

pilots.name: Braylen Stramm
pilots.caption: Blade Leader
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

pilots.name: Ten Numb
pilots.caption: Blue Five
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 stress token to change all of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Ten Numb
pilots.caption: Blue Five
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 stress token to change all of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

pilots.name: Gina Moonsong
pilots.caption: Insubordinate Ace
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you must transfer 1 of your stress tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-2.

pilots.name: Blue Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Due to its heavy weapons array and resilient shielding, the B-wing has solidified itself as the Rebel Alliance's most innovative assault fighter.

pilots.name: Netrem Pollard
pilots.caption: Dagger Leader
pilots.ability: After you barrel roll, you may choose 1 friendly ship that is not stressed at range 0-1. That ship gains 1 stress token, then you rotate 180°.

pilots.name: Blade Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: A unique gyrostabilization system surrounds the B-wing's cockpit, ensuring that the pilot always remains stationary during flight.

pilots.name: Hera Syndulla
pilots.caption: Phoenix Leader
pilots.ability: While another friendly ship at range 1-2 defends or performs an attack, during a Modify Dice step, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens, evade tokens, or locks to that ship.

pilots.name: Norra Wexley
pilots.caption: Gold Nine
pilots.ability: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

pilots.name: Garven Dreis
pilots.caption: Red Leader
pilots.ability: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

pilots.name: Shara Bey
pilots.caption: Green Four
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

pilots.name: Ibtisam
pilots.caption: Survivor of Endor
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are stressed, you may roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, remove 1 stress token.

pilots.name: Wullffwarro
pilots.caption: Wookiee Chief
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are damaged, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Lowhhrick
pilots.caption: Escaped Gladiator
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 becomes the defender, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, that ship gains 1 evade token.

pilots.name: Kashyyyk Defender
pilots.text: Equipped with three wide-range Sureggi twin laser cannons, the Auzituck gunship acts as a powerful deterrent to slaver operations in the Kashyyyk system.

pilots.name: Corran Horn

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

pilots.caption: Tenacious Investigator
pilots.ability: At initiative 0, you may perform a bonus primary attack against an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc]. If you do, at the start of the next Planning Phase, gain 1 disarm token.

pilots.name: Rogue Squadron Escort
pilots.text: The elite pilots of Rogue Squadron are among the Rebellion's very best.

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

pilots.name: Gavin Darklighter

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

pilots.caption: Bold Wingman
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], the attacker may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Knave Squadron Escort
pilots.text: Designed to combine the best features of the X-wing series with the A-wing series, the E-wing boasts superior firepower, speed, and maneuverability.

shipAbility.name: Experimental Scanners
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks beyond range 3. You cannot acquire locks at range 1.

pilots.name: Jan Ors
pilots.caption: Espionage Expert
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship in your firing arc performs a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship may roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Roark Garnet
pilots.caption: Good-Hearted Smuggler
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, it engages at initiative 7 instead of its standard initiative value this phase.

pilots.name: Kyle Katarn
pilots.caption: Relentless Operative
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship in your firing arc.

pilots.name: Rebel Scout
pilots.text: Designed to look like a bird in flight by the Corellian Engineering Corporation, “hawk” series ships are exemplary transport craft. Swift and rugged, the HWK-290 is often employed by Rebel agents as a mobile base of operations.

pilots.name: Arvel Crynyd

shipAbility.name: Vectored Thrusters
shipAbility.text: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Green Leader
pilots.ability: If you would fail a [Boost] action by overlapping another ship, you may resolve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead. While you perform an attack at attack range 0, treat it as an attack at attack range 1.

pilots.name: Green Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: Due to its sensitive controls and high maneuverability, only the most talented pilots belong in an A-wing cockpit.

pilots.name: Cassian Andor
pilots.caption: Raised by the Rebellion
pilots.ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

pilots.name: Bodhi Rook
pilots.caption: Imperial Defector
pilots.ability: Friendly ships can acquire locks onto objects at range 0-3 of any friendly ship.

pilots.name: Heff Tobber
pilots.caption: Blue Eight
pilots.ability: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, if it is at range 0, you may perform an action.

pilots.name: Blue Squadron Scout
pilots.text: Used for deploying troops under the cover of darkness or into the heat of battle, the UT-60D U-wing fulfills the Rebellion's need for a swift and hardy troop transport.

pilots.name: Magva Yarro
pilots.caption: Cavern Angels Spotter
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, the attacker cannot reroll more than 1 attack die.

pilots.name: Saw Gerrera
pilots.caption: Obsessive Outlaw
pilots.ability: While a damaged friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack, it may reroll 1 attack die.

pilots.name: Benthic Two Tubes
pilots.caption: Cavern Angels Marksman
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Focus] action, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship at range 1-2.

pilots.name: Partisan Renegade
pilots.text: Saw Gerrera's partisans were first established to oppose Separatist forces on Onderon during the Clone Wars and continued to wage war against galactic tyranny as the Empire rose to power.

pilots.name: Partisan Renegade
pilots.text: Saw Gerrera's partisans were first established to oppose Separatist forces on Onderon during the Clone Wars and continued to wage war against galactic tyranny as the Empire rose to power.

pilots.name: K-2SO
pilots.caption: Cassian Said I Had To
pilots.ability: After you gain a stress token, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.name: Han Solo
pilots.caption: Scoundrel for Hire
pilots.ability: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0-1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

pilots.name: Chewbacca
pilots.caption: The Mighty
pilots.ability: Before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 [Charge] to be dealt the card facedown instead.

pilots.name: Lando Calrissian
pilots.caption: General of the Alliance
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship may perform an action.

pilots.name: Outer Rim Smuggler
pilots.text: Known for its durability and modular design, the YT-1300 is one of the most popular, widely used, and extensively customized freighters in the galaxy.

pilots.name: Outer Rim Smuggler
pilots.text: Known for its durability and modular design, the YT-1300 is one of the most popular, widely used, and extensively customized freighters in the galaxy.

pilots.ability: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0-1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

pilots.caption: The Mighty

pilots.name: Tala Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The AF4 series is the latest in a long line of Headhunter designs. Cheap and relatively durable, it is a favorite among independent outfits like the Rebellion.

pilots.name: Airen Cracken
pilots.caption: Intelligence Chief
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. That ship may perform an action, treating it as red.

pilots.name: Bandit Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The Z-95 Headhunter was the primary inspiration for Incom Corporation's exemplary T-65 X-wing starfighter. Though it is considered outdated by modern standards, it remains a versatile and potent snub fighter.

pilots.name: Lieutenant Blount
pilots.caption: Team Player
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Hera Syndulla

shipAbility.name: Sensor Blindspot
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0-1, do not apply the range 0-1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.

pilots.caption: Dry-Witted Droid
pilots.ability: After you defend or perform an attack, if you spent a calculate token, gain 1 calculate token.

pilots.name: Wild Space Fringer
pilots.text: Although stock YT-2400 light freighters have plenty of room for cargo, that space is often annexed to support modified weapon systems and oversized engines.

shipAbility.name: Sensor Blindspot
shipAbility.text: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 0-1, do not apply the range 0-1 bonus and roll 1 fewer attack die.

pilots.name: Kanan Jarrus

shipAbility.name: Tail Gun
shipAbility.text: While you have a docked ship, you have a primary [Rear Arc] weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship's primary [Front Arc] attack value.

pilots.caption: Spectre-1
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship in your firing arc defends, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

pilots.name: Hera Syndulla

pilots.name: Lothal Rebel
pilots.text: Another successful Corellian Engineering Corporation freighter design, the VCX-100 is larger than the ubiquitous YT-series, boasting more living space and customizability.

pilots.name: Alderaanian Guard
pilots.text: A craft used since before the Clone Wars, the CR90 corvette is favored by the Royal House of Alderaan for its versatility.

shipAbility.name: Broadside Batteries
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks and perform primary attacks at range 1-4.

pilots.name: Alderaanian Guard
pilots.text: A craft used since before the Clone Wars, the CR90 corvette is favored by the Royal House of Alderaan for its versatility.

shipAbility.name: Broadside Batteries
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks and perform primary attacks at range 1-4.

pilots.name: Echo Base Evacuees
pilots.text: The GR-75 medium transport acquitted itself well at battles such as the evacuation of Hoth, where several of these ships were pivotal to the Rebel forces' escape.

shipAbility.name: Resupply Craft
shipAbility.text: After another friendly ship at range 0-1 performs an action, you may spend 1 [Energy]. If you do, it removes 1 orange or red token, or recovers 1 shield.

pilots.name: Echo Base Evacuees
pilots.text: The GR-75 medium transport acquitted itself well at battles such as the evacuation of Hoth, where several of these ships were pivotal to the Rebel forces' escape.

shipAbility.name: Resupply Craft

pilots.name: Fenn Rau

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Mandalorian Protector
pilots.ability: Before a friendly ship at range 1-2 engages, if there is an enemy ship in its [Front Arc] at range 1, that friendly ship may remove 1 non-lock red token.

pilots.name: Clan Wren Volunteer

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Unlikely Ally
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack at range 1, if the speed of your revealed maneuver matches that of a friendly ship at range 1, you may reroll 1 attack die.

pilots.name: Bodica Venj

shipAbility.name: Concordia Faceoff
shipAbility.text: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front Arc], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.caption: Wrathful Warrior
pilots.ability: After another friendly ship defends, if you are not depleted, you may perform a bonus primary attack against the attacker. If you do, after performing that attack, gain 1 deplete token.
